channel.title: Please, help me with veng
channel.description:
Hello, I need help. The veng I got now makes Silab users get dc..
Could someone post a veng ''code'' that's working both for silab, mopar and clients? pl0x.
Thanks ~ Extoz.

item.title: Please, help me with veng
item.dc:creator: @Gh0st_Jr Gh0st Jr
item.description:
@Gh0st_Jr wrote:

ill give u the basic… but ur gonna have to fill out urself.

case 4169://vengence { if(playerIsMember == 1) if(actionTimer == 0){ { actionTimer = 10; stillgfx(###, absY, absX); <- gfx u want for(int I = 0; I < 20; I++) { } for(int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) { strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; cba = abc / 10; abc2 = cba * 2; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break; } inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1); setAnimation(####); <- his animation txt4 = "what eva u want person to say"; string4UpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); } } } if(playerIsMember == 0) sendMessage("what server gonna say is hes not member."); break;
thats pretty basic.

Read full topic
